title: The truth, the whole truth and nothing but the truth
abstract: The Monopolies and Mergers Commission is an institution set up by the UK government partly to undertake investigations of nationalised industries to see how well they are managed. This paper examines the methods of collecting and analysing data, and the derivation of issues and conclusions from them
